name: tappy towers
description:
this is our game for ld41. it's sort of a tower defense game with skeleton cowboys vs astronauts. jam version is a bit borked, but uploaded what we finished.

  • wasd/arrow to move the camera
  • -/= to zoom in/out
  • click the tower type then the game grid to play towers

place skeleton boys down to have them attack the incoming astro boys before they can get to your base. enemies will go to all the checkpoints before going to attack your main base.

ldjam page

source

by alicia, caleb, christopher, danny, devin, erin

used godot, blender, krita+photoshop, audacity, ...
